casebody.data:
Second Department,

November, 1936.

(November 2, 1936.) Hugh Berzety, Respondent, v. The John Hancock Mutual Life Insurance Company of Boston, Mass., and James H. Malone, Appellants.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Stay continued until the granting or final refusal by the Court of Appeals of leave to appeal. Present — Young, Hagarty, Johnston, Adel and Taylor, JJ.
